name: Perfect Rain
description:
ATTENTION: I'm having problems with the iframe from itch, you can try it HERE (it is the same, just in a separate window, click anywhere to start)

A simple rain simulator made in Python with Pygame and Pygbag, you can mix your perfect rain for a relaxing background noise:

  • Brown noise
  • Pink noise
  • Flowing water
  • Wind
  • Water drops
  • Thunder strikes and volume

Source code: https://github.com/FinFetChannel/perfect-rain
